noUsers.description: {div}[We have not found any saved accounts. Return to the] {div}[[client.wavesplatform.com](https://client.wavesplatform.com)]

beta.step1Description: If you only have your password, not your SEED, you can use this page to restore a saved account.
beta.step2Description: Please, carefully save SEED. If you lose it, you will have no way to access your account.
beta.title: Restore Seed

seedForm.description: Your Seed the 15 words you saved when creating your account
seedForm.placeholder: Your seed is the 15 words you saved when creating your account

seedOrKeyForm.description: Enter your Seed phrase or private key to access your wallet
seedOrKeyForm.title: Import from seed or key

warningSeed.message: Make sure you do not confuse the phrase with a wallet address. Using an address as a SEED phrase can result in loss of funds. The SEED phrase must consist of 15 words with spaces between each word.
warningSeed.title: The SEED phrase you entered is too short.
